description:
It`s been a month since Seth parted ways with Alma. A festival is about to be held in Artemis Academy, and Seth is excited by the joyous atmosphere. The festival appears to be one of Majesty`s whims, but it`s actually held to raise funds for the city`s defense. Its highlight event is the broom race. When Nick, the favorite to win, makes fun of Alma, Seth decides to enter the race using the broom Alma gave him.
Source: crunchyroll
